reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweatshirt cute and comfortable, describing it as warm and cozy. The sizing receives mixed feedback, with some saying the medium fits great while others find it too short in length. The quality is poor according to multiple reviews, and several customers mention the garment has deep wrinkles. The smell is also a concern for some customers.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ADOORABLE!!!
items.body: LUVVV LUVVV LUVVV! The description says sweatshirt, but it definitely feels like a sweater. It looks perfect on me. I I’m going to Denver for the first time in a couple of weeks and it’s my first time seeing snow so I wanted to stock up on cute sweaters. Read more
items.author: Julia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stand out design
items.body: Very stylish. Looked better than the pic. Soft and warm but not too heavy. Love the distinctive flower. Perfect fit Read more
items.author: amanda

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: I love how this sweater looks and I get compliments whenever I wear it, my only complaint is that after just a few wears it doesn’t feel “quality”. For the price it’s fine but I can see it only lasting a couple seasons in my closet Read more
items.author: P W

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute but cheap
items.body: This is such a cute sweater. The idea is perfect. Reality is the sweater is cheaply made. Vey thing and feel is like plastic. Very short. And arrived with deep wrinkles that wouldn’t come out. Read more
items.author: gcannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegance and confort
items.body: Very beautiful! Hot and comfy! I loved! Read more
items.author: Maria Beier

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sizing WAY off
items.body: Size is way off. Ordered a large - it’s small. Very disappointed. Read more
items.author: Barbara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO cute and cozy
items.body: LOVE this sweater! Looks exactly as pictured. I'm 5'0" and around 140 lbs, and the medium fits great. Read more
items.author: Claire

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice design
items.body: Good fit, warm, wore it in countryside England in the Spring which is cold (for me) anyway. Only thing is it's fraying where your bag strap rubs the sweater. But all together good. Read more
items.author: Mia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Grey and Black, Dark Green and White, Khaki, Beige, Apricot and Black, Red and Black, Apricot, Dark Brown and Black, Black and White, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
